statements: SELECT id, food_item, sustainability_score FROM FoodSustainabilityMetrics;
SELECT food_item, carbon_footprint, water_usage FROM FoodSustainabilityMetrics;
SELECT * FROM FoodSustainabilityMetrics WHERE sustainability_score > 75;
SELECT food_item, carbon_footprint, water_usage FROM FoodSustainabilityMetrics ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT id, food_item, sustainability_score, timestamp FROM FoodSustainabilityMetrics WHERE sustainability_score < 50;
SELECT id, food_item, sustainability_score FROM FoodSustainabilityMetrics WHERE sustainability_score > 80 ORDER BY sustainability_score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT food_item, carbon_footprint, water_usage FROM FoodSustainabilityMetrics WHERE carbon_footprint < 5 OR water_usage > 20 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, food_item, carbon_footprint, water_usage FROM FoodSustainabilityMetrics WHERE sustainability_score > 50 AND timestamp >= '2021-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM FoodSustainabilityMetrics WHERE carbon_footprint BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY carbon_footprint ASC, water_usage DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, food_item, sustainability_score, timestamp FROM FoodSustainabilityMetrics WHERE food_item LIKE '%vegetable%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM FoodMetrics ORDER BY food_name ASC
SELECT food_name, sustainability_score FROM FoodMetrics WHERE sustainability_score > 3.5
SELECT id, food_name FROM FoodMetrics WHERE id = 2
SELECT * FROM ProgressTracking WHERE progress < 0.5
SELECT date FROM ProgressTracking ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, food_name, sustainability_score FROM FoodMetrics WHERE sustainability_score > 0.5 ORDER BY food_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT food_name, MAX(sustainability_score) AS max_score FROM FoodMetrics GROUP BY food_name HAVING MAX(sustainability_score) > 0.7
SELECT f.food_name, p.metric_id, p.progress FROM FoodMetrics f INNER JOIN ProgressTracking p ON f.id = p.metric_id WHERE p.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY p.progress DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT f.food_name, SUM(p.progress) AS total_progress FROM FoodMetrics f LEFT JOIN ProgressTracking p ON f.id = p.metric_id GROUP BY f.food_name HAVING total_progress > 50
SELECT f.food_name, COUNT(p.id) AS progress_count FROM FoodMetrics f LEFT JOIN ProgressTracking p ON f.id = p.metric_id GROUP BY f.food_name ORDER BY progress_count DESC
SELECT * FROM Food_Products;
SELECT product_name, category, sustainability_rating FROM Food_Products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, region FROM Food_Products ORDER BY category, region;
SELECT purchase_id, date, quantity, total_cost FROM Purchases WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT stat_id, metric_name, value, source FROM Sustainability_Stats ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Food_Products WHERE category = 'Vegetables';
SELECT product_name, category, region FROM Food_Products WHERE region = 'Asia' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(product_id), category FROM Food_Products GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(product_id) >= 5;

SELECT p.date, f.product_name, s.value FROM Purchases p JOIN Food_Products f ON p.product_id = f.product_id JOIN Sustainability_Stats s ON s.metric_name = f.category WHERE s.value > 0.5 ORDER BY p.date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT DISTINCT f.category, AVG(sp.value) AS average_sustainability_rating FROM Food_Products f JOIN Sustainability_Stats sp ON f.category = sp.metric_name GROUP BY f.category HAVING AVG(sp.value) > 0.6;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT product_name, brand_name, category FROM Food_Products WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT report_date, sustainability_score FROM Sustainability_Reports WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, activity_description, timestamp FROM Dashboard_Logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Food_Products WHERE category = 'Snacks';
SELECT product_name, brand_name, category FROM Food_Products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, sustainability_rating FROM Food_Products WHERE sustainability_rating > 3 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Dashboard_Logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM food_products;
SELECT name, price FROM food_products WHERE category = 'Fruit';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT metric_name, value, unit FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE date_collected >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT dashboard_name, value, date_collected FROM dashboard_data ORDER BY date_collected ASC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM food_products;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE value > 100 AND date_collected >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT dashboard_name, value, date_collected FROM dashboard_data ORDER BY date_collected DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT metric_name, unit, date_collected FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE '%carbon%';
